TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner

summary.span: 提供基底控制項設計工具類別，以擴充 Web 伺服器控制項的設計模式行為。

span.span: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底控制項設計工具類別可以繼承自和擴充設計主機中的 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class provides a base control designer class that can be inherited from and extended to provide design-time support for a Web server control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 使用設計階段呈現的物件模型被改善對舊版本中，下列新基底類別，以提供簡化的物件模型的存取權：The object model for working with design-time rendering is improved over earlier versions, with the following new base classes to provide access to the simplified object model: - 這不是新的但已大幅改善。, which is not new, but has been greatly improved. - 。. - 。. ## 自動格式化Automatic Formatting 您可以建立各種不同的自動和預先定義的格式，以簡化網頁開發人員會將複雜的樣式變更套用至自訂 Web 伺服器控制項的程序。You can create a variety of automatic and pre-defined formats that can simplify the process of page developers who are applying complex style changes to custom Web server controls. 例如，控制項是衍生自類別，提供許多可供選擇的自動格式。For example, the control, which derives from the class, provides many automatic formats from which to choose. 實作，提供在您的自訂控制項中的自動格式設定，請使用下列功能：To implement and provide automatic formatting in your custom controls, use the following features: - 屬性。The property. - 方法The method. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. ## 動作清單 （智慧標籤）Action Lists (Smart Tags) 動作清單是功能表的重要或廣泛使用的網頁開發人員使用控制項可以在設計階段使用者介面 (UI) 中執行的工作，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。Action lists are menus of important or widely used tasks that a page developer who uses a control can perform in a design-time user interface (UI), such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 例如，您的控制項的設計階段檢視可以提供可用工作的功能表。For example, the design-time view of your control could provide a menu of available tasks. 這包括自動格式化控制項的工作。This includes a task to format the control automatically. 若要深入了解動作清單，開始的下列功能：To learn about action lists, start with the following features: - 屬性。The property. - 類別。The class. - 方法The method. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. ## 控制項設計工具區域Control Designer Regions 區域是在 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段檢視中可編輯區域。Regions are editable areas in the design-time view of a Web server control. 這項功能提供了類似於 WYSIWYG 編輯樣板內容、 內部的控制項和屬性在設計階段。This feature offers WYSIWYG-like editing of the template content, inner controls, and properties at design time. 您可以在區域中建立控制項的控制項設計工具，或您可以使用 [工具箱] 拖放控制項的區域。You can have the control designer create controls in regions or you can use the Toolbox to drag and drop controls into regions. 區域是受管理的下列功能：Regions are managed with the following features: - 方法The method. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. ## 範本Templates 模型的設計階段編輯樣板化控制項，例如建立 UI控制項，已經大幅改善從舊的版本。The model for creating a UI for design-time editing of templated controls, such as the control, has been greatly improved from earlier versions. 您可以建立包含控制項的各種組件範本的複雜自訂控制項，而且您自訂控制項的設計工具可協助網頁開發人員正在修改範本的下列功能：You can create complex custom controls that include templates for various parts of the control, and your custom control designer can help page developers who are modifying templates with the following features: - 屬性。The property. - 屬性。The property. - 類別。The class. ## 設計階段呈現Design-Time Rendering 類別具有下列方法，以支援的 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段呈現。The class has the following methods to support design-time rendering of the Web server control. 大部分的這些方法都是與舊版相同：Most of these methods are the same as in earlier versions: - 方法The method. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的設計工具類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple designer class that derives from the class. 此控制項設計工具支援自訂`TextControl`類別，並提供變更控制項的大小，在設計階段的命令。This control designer supports a custom `TextControl` class and provides a command to change the text size of a control at design time. 藉由指定控制項設計工具中的控制項的設計工具是與控制項相關聯物件上宣告`TextControl`類別。The control designer is associated with the control by specifying the control designer in a object declaration on the `TextControl` class. 要保存屬性變更的索引鍵，從控制項設計工具的 HTML 標記中找到`ToggleTextSize`方法的自訂`ActionList`類別。The key to persisting property changes from the control designer to the HTML markup is found in the `ToggleTextSize` method of the custom `ActionList` class. 若要嘗試的範例，請新增 System.Design.dll 組件的參考並編譯程式碼。To try the example, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly and compile the code. [!code-csharp[ControlDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/cs/TextControlDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/vb/TextControlDesigner.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlDesignerSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/cs/TextControlDesigner.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlDesignerSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/vb/TextControlDesigner.aspx#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來建立要在設計階段顯示控制項的錯誤訊息 HTML 標記。Use the method to create HTML markup to display an error message for a control at design time. 值`errorMessage`指定控制項的使用者顯示在設計階段的當地語系化的字串。The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time. 類別實作方法會傳回具有兩個資料列的資料表，如下所示：The class implementation of the method returns a table with two rows, as follows: - 第一個資料列包含型別名稱和網站名稱以進行屬性物件。The first row contains the type name and site name for the property of the object. - 第二個資料列都包含輸入的錯誤訊息字串。The second row contains the input error message string. 若要產生的例外狀況相關聯的錯誤訊息 HTML 標記，請使用多載。To generate HTML markup for an error message with an associated exception, use the overload. 產生例外狀況的 HTML 標記，而不指定當地語系化的錯誤訊息，請使用方法。To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the method.

para.span: 多載在功能上相當於呼叫方法以設定為 e 。

span.span: The overload is functionally equivalent to calling the method with e set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以提供簡單的 HTML 標記可以用來在設計階段顯示控制項的錯誤和例外狀況詳細資料。Use the method to provide simple HTML markup that can be used to display error and exception details for a control at design time. 值`errorMessage`指定控制項的使用者顯示在設計階段的當地語系化的字串。The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time. 類別實作方法會傳回具有兩個資料列的資料表，如下所示：The class implementation of the method returns a table with two rows, as follows: - 第一個資料列包含型別名稱和網站名稱以進行屬性物件。The first row contains the type name and site name for the property of the object. - 第二個資料列都包含輸入的錯誤訊息和例外狀況的字串。The second row contains the input error message and the string of the exception. 若要產生錯誤訊息 HTML 標記，但未指定例外狀況，請使用多載。To generate HTML markup for an error message without specifying an exception, use the overload. 產生例外狀況的 HTML 標記，而不指定當地語系化的錯誤訊息，請使用方法。To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前檢視的唯讀範本，或例如在設計主機中正在編輯的可編輯的範本時，Web 伺服器控制項是於範本模式下[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。A Web server control is in template mode when a read-only template is currently being viewed or an editable template is being edited in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 類別會提供預設值物件更新時範本模式變更相關聯控制項的值。The class supplies a default object to update the value when the template mode changes for the associated control. 衍生自的自訂設計工具類別可以覆寫方法，以執行額外處理時的樣板編輯模式變更設計主機中的控制項。Custom designers that are derived from the class can override the method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control in the design host.

span.span: Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法會通知由設計主應用程式屬性`component`，變更會發生在相關聯的控制項，且如果設計主應用程式未取消變更則會叫用指定`callback`使用指定`context`，然後通知設計主應用程式已完成變更。The implementation of the method notifies the design host, which is determined by the property of `component`, that a change is occurring in the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context`, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed. 如果設計主應用程式或相關聯的控制項就會擲回靜態`Canceled`的例外狀況欄位例外狀況，交易被取消而不叫用`callback`。If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的複合控制項，與和控制項，及其屬性來設定的標籤文字，以及， ，和屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a and a control, together with properties to set the label text, and also the , , and properties of the control. 針對關聯的控制項設計工具類別會建立三個命令，其中每個控制項設定兩個屬性。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control. 使用方法，您可以使用復原功能的設計主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，回復每個已完成的交易，做為一個單位。By using the method, you can use the undo functionality of the design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], to roll back each completed transaction as a unit. [!code-csharp[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/CS/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/VB/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法會通知由設計主應用程式屬性`component`，變更是否發生指定`member`（屬性或方法） 針對關聯控制項的並在變更不會取消所設計主應用程式、 叫用指定`callback`使用指定`context`做為引數，然後通知設計主應用程式已完成變更。The implementation of the method notifies the design host, which is determined by the property of `component`, that a change is occurring to the specified `member` (property or method) of the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context` as the argument, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed. 如果設計主應用程式或相關聯的控制項就會擲回靜態`Canceled`的例外狀況欄位例外狀況，交易被取消而不叫用`callback`。If the design host or associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式中設計介面控制項上的某些動作會引發事件。The event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，下列條件引發事件：For example, an event is raised for the following conditions: - 使用者按一下控制項時。The user clicks the control. - 在設計介面上的控制項設計工具繪製。The control designer paints on the design surface. - 使用者輸入，或結束範本編輯模式的控制項。The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control. 類別提供的預設委派處理事件。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 類別衍生自覆寫程序引發的事件，當使用者按一下控制項的方法。Classes deriving from override the method to process events that are raised when the user clicks a control. 方法允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 預設實作方法傳回時不執行任何處理。The default implementation of the method returns without performing any processing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式可點選區域的控制項，然後使用中的事件物件識別在按下的區域。The following code example shows how to use a handler for the event in a clickable region of the control and use a object to identify the region that is being clicked. 這個程式碼範例是較大的程式碼範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger code example for the class. [!code-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式中設計介面控制項上的某些動作會引發事件。The event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，下列條件引發事件：For example, an event is raised for the following conditions: - 使用者按一下控制項時。The user clicks the control. - 設計主機要求 HTML 標記來呈現關聯的控制項的設計介面上。The design host requests HTML markup to render the associated control on the design surface. - 使用者輸入，或結束範本編輯模式的控制項。The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control. 類別提供的預設委派處理事件。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 類別衍生自應該設定值，並覆寫設計主應用程式繪製控制項的設計介面上時所引發的程序事件的方法。Classes deriving from should set the value and override the method to process events that are raised when the design host draws the control on the design surface. 方法允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 預設實作方法傳回時不執行任何處理。The default implementation of the method returns without performing any processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當複製的項目時，可能會有一些內部資料結構，例如`meta:`屬性應該由控制項設計工具包含在複製的控制項。Whenever an item is cloned, there might be some internal data structures, such as `meta:` attributes, that should be included in the cloned control by the control designer. 網頁開發人員可能會加入`meta:`屬性，將控制項的標記和那里任何方法，也沒有要區別這些標記可能會讓控制項的原因。A page developer might add `meta:` attributes to the markup of a control and there is no way, nor is there a reason, for the control to distinguish what those tags might be. 因此，如果您的控制項設計工具提供方法，以將變更套用至頁面之前，請先編輯複雜的內容或格式，您會建立控制項的複製品，將原始的控制項和複製傳遞至此方法，然後時所做的變更標記會保存所有`meta:`屬性也會保存。Therefore, if your control designer provides a way to edit complex properties or formats before applying changes to a page, you would create a clone of the control, pass both the original control and the clone to this method, and then, when the changes are persisted to the tag, all `meta:` attributes are also persisted.

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 伺服器控制項，可用於預覽設計階段的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Gets or sets a Web server control that can be used for previewing the design-time HTML markup.

value.span: 物件，可供基底類別產生設計階段 HTML 標記。

span.span: A object used by the base class to generate design-time HTML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性使用屬性來判斷它的傳回值。The property uses the property to determine its return value. 如果屬性是`true`、屬性會傳回控制項的暫存副本。If the property is `true`, the property returns a temporary copy of the control. 不會保存暫存控制項的變更。Changes to the temporary control are not persisted. 如果屬性是`false`、屬性傳回的執行個體控制項的屬性。If the property is `false`, the property returns an instance of the property for the control. 控制項的執行個體的變更會保存。Changes to the instance of the control are persisted. 中設定物件用來設定的值屬性。The setting in the object is used to set the value of the property. 因此，設定會決定所傳回的控制項類型屬性的基底中類別。Therefore, the setting determines the type of control that is returned by the property in the base class. 如果控制項設計工具宣告中未指定物件行為相當於指定屬性做為`false`。If the is not specified in the control designer declaration, the object behavior is equivalent to specifying the property as `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將標示控制項設計工具與屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to mark a control designer with the attribute. 程式碼範例衍生從 Web 伺服器控制項類別，並將控制項相關聯的自訂控制項設計工具的實作。The code example derives a Web server control from the class and associates the control with a custom control designer implementation. 控制項設計工具類別，宣告會標示`SupportsPreviewControl`屬性設為`true`。The control designer class declaration is marked with the `SupportsPreviewControl` attribute set to `true`. 控制項的設計工具會覆寫方法，然後按一下 顯示以斜體表示在設計階段控制項的屬性。The control designer overrides the method, and then displays the property of the control in italic at design time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute/CS/supportspreviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute/VB/supportspreviewdesigner.vb#1)]
